review: Celebrated my son's birthday by escaping Ammon's Passage. Had a blast!

review: We had a blast! We were in the Egypt room. The kids loved finding the clues!

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: I had so much fun solving the puzzles and escaping the Egyptian themed Ammon's Passage. Every aspect of the game was well thought out! We will be back to escape another room.

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: The Egypt room was perfect for my daughter's 13th birthday with friends. We used all the clues and escaped with only a few minutes to spare. It was very challenging and the girls had a blast. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Egypt: Ammon’s Passage" by Locked Inside Room Escape in Melbourne
review: I had a blast in the Egypt room last night with all my friends! 8 of us all together, myself included decided to try this out. We are glad we did because had so much fun! I have to give a major shoutout to your employee John though because he was such a good sport helping us out and dealing with my crazy friends. We will definitely be coming back! Thank you for a great time and the coupon for Longdoggers! We went there after for a victory treat since we escaped with 6 minutes to spare!
